controls.label: Does your AML/CTF program include systems and controls to determine the beneficial owner of each customer?
controls.detail-label: Describe your systems and controls for determining beneficial owners, including timing (before or as soon as practicable after designated service provision)

controls.label: For customers who are individuals, does your program allow the assumption that the customer and beneficial owner are the same unless you have reasonable grounds to consider otherwise?

Does your program exempt beneficial owner collection for customers that are: companies verified under simplified company procedure (4.3.8), trusts verified under simplified trustee procedure (4.4.8), Australian Government entities, or foreign listed public companies subject to beneficial ownership transparency requirements?
controls.detail-label: Describe how your program identifies and exempts these customer types from beneficial owner collection

controls.label: Does your program include a procedure to collect each beneficial owner's full name?
Does your program include a procedure to collect either the beneficial owner's date of birth OR full residential address (or both)?
Does your program include risk-based systems and controls to determine whether to collect and verify additional information about beneficial owners beyond the minimum requirements?
controls.detail-label: Describe your risk-based approach for determining when additional beneficial owner information is required

controls.label: Does your program require verification of beneficial owner information using reliable and independent documentation, reliable and independent electronic data, or a combination of both?
controls.detail-label: Describe your verification methods and what constitutes reliable and independent sources

controls.label: Does your program identify when a beneficial owner is a foreign politically exposed person (PEP)?
controls.detail-label: Describe how you screen for and identify foreign PEPs among beneficial owners

controls.label: For beneficial owners who are NOT foreign PEPs and are assessed as medium or lower ML/TF risk, does your program allow use of the safe harbour verification procedures?

For documentation-based safe harbour verification, does your program verify beneficial owner's full name and either residential address or date of birth using: (a) original or certified copy of primary photographic ID, OR (b) original or certified copy of primary non-photographic ID plus secondary ID?
controls.detail-label: Describe your documentation-based safe harbour procedure and acceptable document types

controls.label: Does your safe harbour documentation procedure verify that documents have not expired (except Commonwealth passports expired within the preceding two years)?

For electronic-based safe harbour verification, does your program verify beneficial owner's full name and either residential address or date of birth using reliable and independent electronic data from at least two separate data sources?
controls.detail-label: Describe your electronic verification procedure including the data sources used

controls.label: Does your program include risk-based systems and controls to respond to discrepancies that arise during beneficial owner verification to determine that you are reasonably satisfied the beneficial owner is who the customer claims?
controls.detail-label: Describe your procedures for identifying and responding to verification discrepancies

controls.label: If you are unable to ascertain a beneficial owner, does your program identify and take reasonable measures to verify an individual with significant control or senior management position as specified in the fallback procedures?
controls.detail-label: Describe your fallback procedures for different entity types (companies, partnerships, trusts, associations, co-operatives)

groups.title: Beneficial Ownership Identification Program
groups.description: Systems and controls to determine and verify the beneficial owners of customers, with risk-based procedures and exemptions for certain customer types.

groups.title: Scope and General Obligation
groups.description: Determine whether beneficial ownership collection and verification applies to this customer type.

groups.title: Collection of Beneficial Owner Information
groups.description: Collect identifying information about each beneficial owner, or determine if exemptions apply.

groups.title: Verification of Beneficial Owner Information
groups.description: Verify beneficial owner information using reliable and independent sources.

groups.title: Safe Harbour Verification Procedures
groups.description: Simplified verification options for medium or lower ML/TF risk beneficial owners (not applicable to foreign PEPs).

groups.title: Discrepancy Handling and Fallback Procedures
groups.description: Respond to verification discrepancies and apply fallback procedures when beneficial owner cannot be determined.
